values: A rebel is a person who fights the government in order to change it.
The rebel was angry about the government’s unfair policies.
n. 反叛者；叛徒 adj. 反抗的；造反的 vi. 反叛；反抗；造反
n. 反政府的人；反叛者；造反者叛逆者
vi. 反抗政府；造反反抗权威；叛逆
时态:rebelled，rebelling，rebels
